name: BIT MINE RUSH
description:
Fight through the 5 mines that contain more and more bosses as you go further deeper , however the bosses of each mine are angry at you! 

That's why they casted spell that will throw you further down the mine ! Defeat them before the spell finishes and go back to town so you can upgrade your abilities.

However if you do not defeat the bosses on the 4th mine ,they will eject you to outer space!
